forest_clearing.description: You are in a lush clearing. A path leads North to a bridge and East to a dark cave.

stone_bridge.description: A sturdy stone bridge. A grumpy troll stands here, blocking the North path.

north.fail_msg: The troll growls: 'No one crosses without a gift!'

give_coin.success_msg: The troll happily takes the coin and steps aside.
give_coin.fail_msg: You have nothing the troll wants.

dragon_cave.description: It's dark. A sleeping dragon lies atop a pile of gold.
